summary: A Pakistani involved in a planned attack in New York City experiences a crisis of conscience.
cast: Ayad Akhtar|Firdous Bamji|Nandana Sen|Sarita Choudhury|Charles Daniel Sandoval|Varun Sriram|Anjeli Chapman|John Ventimiglia|Michael McGlone|Aasif Mandvi|Ajay Naidu|Kamal Marayati|Wayman Ezell|James Rana|Christopher Castelo|Christine Commesso|John Zibell|Joseph Ascolese|Douglas Paretti|Michael Balsley|Rob Carroll|David Bishins|Angel Desai|Samrat Chakrabarti|Per Melita|Roy Farfel|Jeff Ward|Glenn Pike|Vanessa A. Londino|Deepti Gupta|Farah Bala|Deepa Purohit|Goli Samii|Troy Hall|David Connolly|Dianne Busch|Joseph M. Abbott|Dimitra Bixby|Sam Ghosh
title: The War Within
